item.title: Jen add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Up ahead they's a thousan' lives we might live, but when it comes it'll on'y be one." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jen add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jen add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "I wonder how many people I've looked at all my life and never seen." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jen add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I think and think and think, I‘ve thought myself out of happiness one million times, but never once into it." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jen add a quote by Fyodor Dostoyevsky
item.description: "Brother, I’m not depressed and haven’t lost spirit. Life everywhere is life, life is in ourselves and not in the external. There will be people near me, and to be a human being among human beings, and remain one forever, no matter what misfortunes befall, not to become depressed, and not to falter – this is what life is, herein lies its task." -- Fyodor Dostoyevsky

item.title: Jen add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "and in the eyes of the people there is the failure; and in the eyes of the hungry there is a growing wrath. In the souls of the people the grapes of wrath are filling and growing heavy, growing heavy for the vintage." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jen add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Jen add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "I love the relationship that anyone has with music ... because there's something in us that is beyond the reach of words, something that eludes and defies our best attempts to spit it out. ... It's the best part of us probably ..." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Jen add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jen add a quote by Sanaya Roman
item.description: "Your attitude determines how you experience the world." -- Sanaya Roman
